content: Anyone know how to get details about a node's menu link in views in D7? E.g. I have a view of nodes, and alongside the node title, body, etc. I want to output details about that node's menu link (like the menu link name, parent, weight, etc.) Is that possible?

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4505

[D9] Add menu link support into views 路 Issue #4505 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
This was brought up by @BWPanda in Zulip: BWPanda (Peter): Anyone know how to get details about a node's menu link in views in D7? E.g. I have a view of nodes, and alongside the node title, bod...
